reviewText: this movie was so low budget...omg...hate i wasted my money on it...the movie was in good condition, but ugh, the story line was horrible!!!

This is a ridiculous movie, was a very silly story line. Not to mention that it is EXTREMELY POORLY done. If I had to guess, I would think that the total budget for this disaster of a movie is $212. Don't waste your time.
This movie was a very low budgeted movie and I was very dissapointed once I watched it.

Must be the worst movie ever made
Don't even bother to take out of Wrapping

Sorry to say but the previous reviewer was correct. This really is one of the worst films ever made. I can't catalogue everything which is wrong with this but believe me it has no redeeming factors.

A real pity after quite enjoying "Gang of Roses", another "new wave" urban western. On this one however - save your money.

we rented this out along with Gunslingers Revenge and Brothers in Arms, all "B" movies, we stopped watching Ride Sweet Die Slow after  10 minutes, the acting was horrible, the story was undecipherable, and the actual film quality was poor.
